crudr 0.0.1.21
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Function reference

    All functions

    cdr_adj_timezone()
    adjust for timezone treatment between databases
    cdr_admin_key_ui()
    UI module interface button for row additions and/or row deletions in server module table
    cdr_admin_tbl_ui()
    UI module to output a DT from the Server module
    cdr_append_tbl()
    Appends data from a dataframe into an existing database table with the same structure
    cdr_chk_uniq_id()
    Checks availability of unique ID in DB
    cdr_coerce_value()
    change cell value using DT::coerceValue
    cdr_create_row_in_db()
    Appends new row to primary table
    cdr_delete_row_in_db()
    Removes specified row from db table
    cdr_deliver_admin_tbl()
    gets the administrator table for the Shiny UI
    cdr_deliver_chg_log_tbl()
    gets the change history table for the Shiny UI
    cdr_impart_chg_log_tbl()
    Download database change log and sync it to user interface
    cdr_impart_primary_tbl()
    Download database table and sync it to user interface
    cdr_join_tbls()
    Join primary and deltas tables
    cdr_js_edit_ctrl()
    Allows key use to navigate table and edit cells
    cdr_make_db_tbls()
    Creates primary and deltas tables in a db
    cdr_make_unique_ids()
    Title
    cdr_manage_db_tbls()
    Server module to present and control a db table
    cdr_name_delta_tbl()
    creates the name of the change tracking table so it's set in one location
    cdr_remove_tbl()
    removes a specified table by deleting the table or by removing just the table data (truncating)
    cdr_reset_db()
    removes the tables written to a db and closes the connection
    cdr_row_editor_html()
    creates the html for the UI to add and delete new rows given the permissions to do so
    cdr_update_db_deltas_tbl()
    Populates deltas table when user updates primary table
    cdr_update_db_primary_tbl()
    updates the primary db table by specifying value to change, corresponding db table, unique row ID, and column

    Developed by eau leaf.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
